description:
Beach Sempai: Beach! Swimsuits! Training camp!
Crab Sempai: Lying on the beach with Madara-san<3
Watermelon Sempai: Sempai is the watermelon-splitting champion.
Fireworks Sempai: Sempai is not allowed fire!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beach Sempai / Crab Sempai / Watermelon Sempai / Fireworks Sempai
